39020700-a0ce-4a52-b909-941284876096.title: Naruto
39020700-a0ce-4a52-b909-941284876096.author: Masashi Kishimoto
39020700-a0ce-4a52-b909-941284876096.description: A young ninja strives to be the best in his village.

288ce411-c560-46aa-b628-e960815cd32c.title: The Beginning After the End
288ce411-c560-46aa-b628-e960815cd32c.author: TurtleMe
288ce411-c560-46aa-b628-e960815cd32c.description: A former king in a new world must navigate life as both a child and a warrior.

7564aa89-18b2-420f-9086-935debec5ba5.title: Dorohedoro
7564aa89-18b2-420f-9086-935debec5ba5.author: Q Hayashida
7564aa89-18b2-420f-9086-935debec5ba5.description: In a city so dismal it's known only as 'the Hole,' a clan of Sorcerers has been plucking people off the streets to use as guinea pigs for atrocious experiments in the black arts.
